title: create a theme
content:
Create an inspirational theme.
It can litteraly be anything.

Feed it with inspirations & watch it grow.

title: add inspiration
content: Add pictures, raw ideas, lines of text interest, anything that pops in your mind and that may add up.

title: share a theme
content: Once the team is satisfied, export the document as a creative brief for communication purpose.

title: finalize & export
content:
Invite users to participate and grow the theme together.


any member of the theme can add pictures, text, colors or fabrics.
